Package com.sunbe85.apcsfinal.classes

Class DrawUtils

java.lang.Object
com.sunbe85.apcsfinal.classes.DrawUtils
public class DrawUtils extends Object
A class with several utilities for rendering objects in the Pane more easily

      Draws text on the screen
      Parameters:
      t - The drawable text
      family - The font family
      size - The font size
      x - The x position
      y - The y position
      pane - The Pane to add objects to

    • addImage

      public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView addImage(String fileAddress, int x, int y, int fitWidth, boolean preserveRation, javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
      Renders an image on the screen
      Parameters:
      fileAddress - The address of the image file, from the source root
      x - The x position of the image
      y - The y position of the image
      fitWidth - The width of the image
      preserveRation - Indicates whether the aspect ratio of the image should be preserved
      root - The Pane to add objects to
      Returns:
      The ImageView that is created

    • drawBoxWithOuterBorder

      public static BoxWithBorder drawBoxWithOuterBorder(double x, double y, double width, double height, double borderWidth, int arcDimension, int borderArcDimension, javafx.scene.paint.Color boxColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color borderColor, javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
      Renders a box on the screen with the border on the outside
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the inner box
      y - The y position of the inner box
      width - The width of the inner box
      height - The height of the inner box
      borderWidth - The width of the border, used in calculations for the x, y, width, and height of the border rect
      arcDimension - The radius of the rounded corners of the inner rect
      borderArcDimension - The radius of the rounded corners of the border rect, not calculated automatically because values seem inconsistent
      boxColor - The background color of the inner box
      borderColor - The color of the border
      root - The Pane to add objects to
      Returns:
      The box with border that is created

    • drawBoxWithInnerBorder

      public static BoxWithBorder drawBoxWithInnerBorder(double x, double y, double width, double height, double borderWidth, int arcDimension, int borderArcDimension, javafx.scene.paint.Color boxColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color borderColor, javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
      Renders a box on the screen with the border inside the parameters specified
      Parameters:
      x - The x value of the border box
      y - The y value of the border box
      width - The width of the border box
      height - The height of the border box
      borderWidth - The Width of the border, used to calculate the x, y, width, and height of the inner box
      arcDimension - The radius of the rounded corners of the inner box
      borderArcDimension - The radius of the rounded corners of the border
      boxColor - The color of the box
      borderColor - The color of the border
      root - The Pane to add objects to
      Returns:
      the box with border that is created

      Creates a new dropdown menu
      Parameters:
      options - The options of the dropdown menu
      y - The y position of the box (x currently automatically centered)
      root - The Pane to add objects to
      Returns:
      The ChoiceBox

      Parameters:
      root - The Pane to clear

      public static ArrayList<javafx.scene.Node> remove(ArrayList<javafx.scene.Node> nodes, javafx.scene.layout.Pane root)
      Removes a certain object from the screen
      Parameters:
      nodes - All parts of the object, everything that should be removed
      root - The Pane to remove objects from
      Returns:
      The nodes that are removed

    • getCenteredX

      public static double getCenteredX(String drawableText, String family, int size, int containerWidth)
      Returns the x value of text, so that it is horizontally centered in a container of specified width
      Parameters:
      drawableText - The string that is being rendered
      family - The font family
      size - The font size
      containerWidth - The width of the container
      Returns:
      The centered x value

    • getCenteredY

      public static double getCenteredY(String drawableText, String family, int size, int containerHeight)
      Returns the y value of text, so that it is horizontally centered in a container of specified height
      Parameters:
      drawableText - The string that is being rendered
      family - The font family
      size - The font size
      containerHeight - The width of the container
      Returns:
      The centered y value
